content.title: might-of-the-frozen-wastes
content.content: Increases the damage of Obliterate con two handed weapons in a 30%. Moreover, increases the chance to critically hit con auto attacks

content.title: killing-machine
content.content: Critically hits with auto attacks provokes that the next Obliterate will be cr√≠tic and does frost damage.

content.title: obliteration
content.content: Meanwhile Pilar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always trigger Killing Machine. Also, has a 30% to generate a rune

content.title: rime
content.content: Obliterate has a 45% tto provoke the next Howling Blast to deal 300% damage and no cost rune

content.title: inexorable-assault
content.content: Every 8 seconds gives an accumulation up to 5. Every accumulation gives extra frost damage to an Obliterate

content.title: avalanche
content.content: Howling Blast deals extra frost damage

key.title: Obliterate
key.content:
Basic physical strike of the frost death knight. When Killing Machine is active, it deals always a critically hit and the damage is frost. Dealing super strikes of a lot of damage.
 That's why we will search ways to improve that strikes

content.title: pillar-of-frost
content.content: This skill will increase the strength a lot and triggers the Obliteration mechanic. Provoking basic skills of the death knight will trigger a Killing Machine always

others.subtitle: Skills that generate Killing Machine during Pillar of Frost
